Confirmation of Payment

By Pressing "I Accept", you: (1) acknowledge that you have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions for using this site; (2) authorize the Department of Feline to charge your account for the payment amount; (3) confirm that the information provided by you is true, complete, and correct to the best of your knowledge and is supplied in good faith; (4) confirm that you are authorized to instruct this payment using the credit card or debit card account included in your payment instructions.

If you choose not to accept the Terms and Conditions, by declining to press "I Accept" you will not be able tot make this payment and none of your personal information will be transmitted or retained by the Department of Feline. If you decline to make this transaction, you will be returned to the payment page.
